name: Prodigy (itch) (HUNGRYCAT)
description:
Start A Rock Band!

Go on tours, release music and perform at the BIGGEST festivals!

Live The Rockstar Lifestyle!

Do drugs and party, or stay clean and chill, the choice is yours!

Become A Household Name!

Be the next nirvana and revolutionise music forever or get swept under the rug and stay underground.


Game is in alpha, bugs may occur and some game featues are not available yet.

Full version coming April - May 2023.
